Why choose CNO ?

only three days to go to the market

DAY 1
Prepare easily your work environment

You connect all your multi-cloud Kubernetes clusters, define your tagging strategy and configure your authentification method.

DAY 2
Onboard all your teams and project

All your organization teams follow the adoption program. Project owners, developers, operations and security teams are fully onboarded.

DAY 3
Go on your market In just a few clicks

You simply take control of your business innovation by choosing the continuous devloyment model that best suits your needs such Blue/Green.

Gain freedom. Take control. Innovate every week.

Ask for a demo - it’s free

From 2018, we have been helping large companies to make the most of their Kubernetes ecosystems. Potential barriers preventing total digital transformation have been considered. Brainstorming sessions with clients have occurred to make sure we were on the right track. Finally, we could say, “we can do it”. After thousands of hours of coding, we have CNO as you see it today.
